info.name: Gmail - 'Preview' theme fix (even denser)
info.description:
So for anyone who has tried the new Gmail theme, you've probably noticed that everything's a bit larger.
Waste of screen IMO, so I fixed it.

Style built in Firefox 5, not tested in Chrome.
info.additionalInfo:
2011-08-22 Minor update
- Fixes relating to change in Gmail CSS
